Task.Name: Project Planning
Task.Description: Initial planning phase, including project scope, resource allocation, and timeline establishment.

Task.Name: Environment Setup
Task.Description: Setup development, staging, and production environments using cloud services and integrate necessary development tools.

Task.Name: Backend Development
Task.Description: Rewriting the backend APIs from Node.js to Rust, ensuring compatibility with existing MERN stack.

Task.Name: Integration Testing
Task.Description: Testing the new Rust backend with the existing frontend and database to ensure full system integration.

Task.Name: Performance Optimization
Task.Description: Optimize the system for performance, focusing on reducing latency and memory consumption.

Task.Name: User Acceptance Testing
Task.Description: Final testing phase to ensure the system meets user expectations and behaves as intended under load.

Task.Name: Deployment
Task.Description: Deploy the new Rust backend into production environment, ensuring minimal downtime and disruption.

Task.Name: Post-Deployment Monitoring
Task.Description: Monitor the system post-deployment to track performance issues and ensure stability.
